Provider DocumentationÂ¶

Authentication Providers supply varying levels of information when authentication has occurred. Some of them can also provide API access tokens in addition to authenticating a user for sign-on. In each provider section, we have outlined how to use each provider as a pyramid plugin and as a part of the velruse standalone application.

  • Facebook - velruse.providers.facebook
  • Github - velruse.providers.github
  • Google
  • Windows Live - velruse.providers.live
  • Mail.ru - velruse.providers.mailru
  • OpenID - velruse.providers.openid
  • Twitter - velruse.providers.twitter
  • VK - velruse.providers.vk
  • Yahoo - velruse.providers.yahoo
  • Yandex - velruse.providers.yandex
